page.title: 15LUCY'S SATURDAY IN BALBY
page.content: Usually I clean and feed our pets on Saurday mornings. My brother holds them while I clean the cages. I am 9 and my brother is 7. We have a white rabbit with pink eyes named Snoopy, a guinea pig called Ginger Biscuit, 2 goldfisn named Sooty and Sweep, a dog named Sally and a cat named Tibby. Sally is a black labrador. She is 12 years old. We don't know how old Tibby is. We found her as a kitten under a bush on our allotment. She has ginger and white fur and loves being stroked. All the animals eat food from the pet shop. After cleaning the animals we play all day except for meal times. In the evening we both go to the Saturday Club run by the church. It's fun. We play snooker or badminton. We go to bed at 9pm after a pleasant day of work and recreation.
